original_title: Hey Fhuk Yew 2! The Secrets of Flirting
overview: The sequel to Hey Fhuk Yew! "I just had another break up. Nothing was planned or timed; I just started doodling and this is what came out. It was a blast to have this play at Spike and MIke's Sick and Twisted Animation Festival. There was a big response to the squirrel scene."
title: Hey Fhuk Yew 2! The Secrets of Flirting
